Key Match Events: In the 2nd ODI, Sri Lanka set a target of 241 runs, finishing at 240/9 in 50 overs. India was all out for 208 in 42.2 overs, losing by 32 runs.
Washington Sundar took 3 wickets for 30 runs in 10 overs.
Kuldeep Yadav took 2 wickets for 33 runs in 10 overs.
Axar Patel took 1 wicket for 38 runs in 9 overs.
Jeffrey Vandersay took 6 wickets for 33 runs in 10 overs.
Charith Asalanka took 3 wickets for 20 runs in 6.2 overs.
Pre-Game Insights: The 3rd ODI of the India tour of Sri Lanka 2024 will be held on Wednesday, 7 August 2024, at R.Premadasa Stadium, Colombo.
Sri Lanka is leading the series after a tie in the first match and a win in the second match.
Sri Lanka's recent performance has been mixed with wins, losses, and a draw in their last five games.
India's recent performance has also been varied with wins, losses, and a draw in their last five matches.
The pitch at R. Premadasa Stadium supports spin bowling and favors slow spin, with conducive batting conditions for high scores.
The weather forecast for Colombo indicates a temperature of 29.5°C with overcast clouds and no chance of rain.
